title: Game Doesnt Work PLease Help after updating @RIOT
body:
when i click %%% launch button it goes grey nothing happens %%%n it goes yellow again. i really wan to play %%% new ryze :(
thank you
fixed

replies.body:
Hey there,

I believe there may have been some server downtime around the time of your post.

Could you confirm if you're still experiencing this issue for me.
